description: A React component named FavoritesPanel that renders a side drawer listing favorite recipes, allowing users to view, remove, and clear favorites.

methods.name: FavoritesPanel({ open, onClose, onOpenRecipe })
methods.description: React functional component that displays and manages a list of favorite recipes in a side drawer.

methods.name: openRecipe
methods.description: Handler function to navigate to a recipe Details page or invoke the provided callback with the recipe.
